0:
mkdir -p ~/.ssh
chmod 700 ~/.ssh 
cp /config/* ~/.ssh/
echo $'\n' >> ~/.ssh/id_*
restic unlock
restic backup /data
restic forget --keep-last 1 --group-by "" --prune

mkdir -p ~/.ssh
chmod 700 ~/.ssh 
cp /config/* ~/.ssh/
echo $'\n' >> ~/.ssh/id_* 
restic init || true

gitlab_enterprise:
  bot:
    username: Codecov

setup:
  debug: no
  loglvl: INFO

  guest_access: off
  admins:
    - service: gitlab_enterprise
      username: Saphir
    - service: gitlab_enterprise
      username: Alexsaphir

  http:
    cookies_domain: ${DOMAIN_NAME}

  timeseries:
    enabled: false

  telemetry:
    enabled: false

notifications:
  slack: off
  gitter: off
  webhook: off
  irc: off
  hipchat: off
